sentences.en: a chemical used in pest control
sentences.cn: 用于防治虫害的一种化学品

sentences.en: At first called Pest - Buda, these three cities easily combined with each other.
sentences.cn: 起初称做佩斯布达的这三座城市,很容易就融合在一起.

sentences.en: Biological control is an ecologically sound approach to pest suppression.
sentences.cn: 生物防治是一种生态学上的很好解决为害物的方法.

sentences.en: Each year ten percent of the crop is lost to a pest called corn rootworm.
sentences.cn: 一种叫玉米根虫的害虫每年会让粮食减产10%。

sentences.en: Europe had bequeathed the rabbit as a pest to Australia.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人把这种兔子作为有害动物传给了澳大利亚.

sentences.en: He climbed on the table, pulled my hair, and was generally a pest.
sentences.cn: 他爬桌子，拽我的头发，总之是个讨厌鬼。

sentences.en: In the spring along the Mississippi River, Cnephia pecuarum is a serious livestock pest.
sentences.cn: 春季密西西比河边的水牛蚋孳生,对家畜为害严重.

sentences.en: Many pest situations are caused by natural phenomena.
sentences.cn: 许多害虫的情况都是由自然现象造成的.

sentences.en: My little brother is a pest when he spoils my games.
sentences.cn: 我的小弟弟破坏我的各种游戏真讨厌.

sentences.en: One hundred million rats are killed each year by pest exterminators.
sentences.cn: 每年灭鼠人员都会杀死1亿只老鼠。

sentences.en: Pest control, we are learning, is just one of the many ways spiders can help us.
sentences.cn: 我们逐渐弄清, 控制害虫只是蜘蛛能帮助我们的许多方法之一.

sentences.en: That disobedient boy is a pest.
sentences.cn: 那不听话的男孩令人讨厌.

sentences.en: That guy is a regular pest.
sentences.cn: 那家伙是个十足的讨厌鬼.

sentences.en: The image of the fox as a pest is grossly exaggerated in anecdote and folklore.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的害人精形象在传闻和民间故事中遭到严重的夸大。

sentences.en: The use of integrated pest management will expand in the twenty - first century.
sentences.cn: 在二十一世纪,害虫综合治理的应用将扩大.

sentences.en: This report is about diagnosis and control of gosling pest.
sentences.cn: 这份报告是关于小鹅瘟的诊断与防制的。

words.tran_cn: 传播疾病的；有害的，毒害的；邪恶的
致命的；有害的；恼人的；危害社会的
引起瘟疫的；瘟疫似的；讨厌的
瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物
困难,麻烦;麻烦的事物,负担
惹人讨厌的人,牛蝇,有害动物,使人痛苦的人

phrases.tran_cn: 病虫害控制；病虫害治理；有害生物管理

trans.tran_cn: 讨厌的人或事，害虫，害鸟，害兽，灾害
trans.tran_en: a small animal or insect that destroys crops or food supplies
